ygData.subject: RE: mino horn
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, when we took them on the week before the patch, Meldrath was green, the guards were blue-yellow (at 37) and hit like giants.  After the patch the
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 20 Oct 1999, Greg Gillan wrote:
>
> If these mino guards were blue to a level 50, they've been changed recently.
> I was there last week with most of my guild, trying to get Meldrath's skull
> for a few of our rangers. The mino guards con'd green to me at 47, and
> yellow to one of our Paladin's in his 20's. Meldrath con'd blue however,
> and I'd say high blue from how hard he'd hit.

Yeah, when we took them on the week before the patch, Meldrath
was green, the guards were blue-yellow (at 37) and hit like
giants. After the patch the guards were green and Meldrath
was blue. Also, the minotaur hero doesn't spawn when you kill
Meldrath anymore. Bad news for the hero bracer hunters.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
